p: The eradication of the virus determined by the new drugs has also led to a marked improvement in the parameters of martial accumulation, demonstrating a synergic action also between the effect of antiviral therapy and iron chelation (Dharamsi et al., 2017; Nagral et al., 2017; Origa et al., 2017; Premkumar et al., 2017; Mehta et al., 2018; Mangia et al., 2019; Ponti et al., 2019).
